name: Venta AI
headline: Find and reach leads with buying intent in Europe
description: Venta finds leads with buying intent in Europe by tracking website visitors, online searches, news and other signals. You can qualify leads by asking our AI assistant questions and create hyper-personalized outreach in five languages based on their intent signals.

founders.name: Lucas Spreiter, Founder
founders.description: Lucas is the co-founder of venta. While studying engineering and IT at the Technical University of Munich he built electric race cars, industrial automation systems and a Hyperloop pod that won the SpaceX Hyperloop competition in 2017. After graduating he founded a company that developed AI systems for enterprises. With his company Venta he works on the mission to develop AI workers for the European Market.

founders.name: Stefan Reuther, Founder
founders.description:
Stefan is the co-founder of Venta. He taught himself coding during high school and started his first job as a software engineer at Linde at the age of 18. 
Later, while studying AI at the University of Amsterdam, he founded Unetiq, an AI enterprise software consultancy which he sold before starting Venta.

## This website uses cookies
We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services.

Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.
We do not use cookies of this type.

Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

# See venta in action
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/67630053e3894752c583f68e_Design%20ohne%20Titel%20\(3\).png)
### **Your new ﻿AI team that never sleeps**
Our AI workers work 24/7 to identify the most relevant leads for you and enrich them with information
[Learn more](https://www.getventa.ai/</contact/contact-3>)
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/66e9858f4eb5cfab671401eb_cyber-security.svg)
**Multi-Channel Outreach without legal risk‍** Reach out on multiple channels like LinkedIn, Phone or via personalized letters while staying compliant with local regulations
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/66e9858bc2d3ef3dfcf5aac7_magic.svg)
**Europe's best contact data** Our AI workers access more than 10 databases and scrape the web to find the companies and contacts that matter for you
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/66e9858bfaf7621b2b389fce_target.svg)
**Qualify against any criteria‍** You decide who you want to target - not a database filter


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/67693edd03a158f6ec6a3fc8_skill-group.png)
# Superhuman skills to bring your outreach to the next level
From searching companies to reaching your prospects on LinkedIn - our AI workers are equipped with all necessary skills to drive meaningful outreach campaigns. So your sales team can focus on what they do best: building meaningful connections. 
[Explore all skills](https://www.getventa.ai/</company/skills>)
# **Three times as many contacts in Europe**
Our AI workers access more than 10 databases and scrape the web themselves to always deliver the best data quality to you
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/67640e4b62db354252c2f539_datacomparison.png)
## What our customers achieve with venta
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/66e1bb57a44fce3a08b47b38_sophie.jpeg)
"Venta's automated lead qualification is a complete game changer. It was the only way we were able to check thousands of companies simultaneously for their retail presence. For me, Venta is the future of a successful new business strategy."
### Sophie Keim
Sales Director, ARNO
"We wanted to target companies based on their employee benefits. It used to take us days to do this research. With venta, it took us less than an hour."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/66e1bb719dac668831a4a34b_susanna.jpeg)
Susanna Mur
Founderguud
"Previously, we had to use four different tools to identify relevant companies and find the best contact person. Thanks to Venta, we can have everything in one tool and run our outbound on autopilot."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/66e1bbcea44fce3a08b4d919_akeed.jpg)
Akeed Azmi
CEOcercli
[Or read our case studies ](https://www.getventa.ai/</company/case-studies>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c2357e9084a4644a5fb3a5_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.getventa.ai/</company/case-studies>)
Seamless integration into your CRM
![AriseHealth logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/66e824450765e2e4b2cabbef_hubspot.png)![OE logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/66e824459df191bdf5f64df6_salesforce.png)![The Paak logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/66e824457f561fc9f0d9d1c8_pipedrive.png)
### Your new co-worker that never sleeps
venta needs **less than 1 hour for setup** - get started today and reach out to qualified contacts 
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
### Frequently Asked Questions
###### Can I use Venta to reach ou﻿t to companies outside of Europe?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c2357e9084a4644a5fb387_icon-chevron-right.svg)
Yes, you can. Venta's AI workers have access to global databases and can conduct research in multiple languages. They are mainly trained in German and English, making them ideal for outreach in these languages.
###### Is Venta GDPR compliant?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c2357e9084a4644a5fb387_icon-chevron-right.svg)
Venta is operated and hosted within the EU, fully complying with GDPR regulations. It also accesses databases outside the EU, that are GDPR compliant as detailed in our General Terms and Conditions.
###### We have specific security requirements that are not addressed on your site. Would you be able to accommodate them?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c2357e9084a4644a5fb387_icon-chevron-right.svg)
We are always trying to accommodate for special requirements. Please get in touch with us. 
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65d6459a060442d1a50023cb_venta_logo%201.png)](https://www.getventa.ai/<#>)
Venta empowers outbound-driven sales teams in Germany to do highly targeted outreach with best in class comp﻿any and contact data. Our AI worker finds companies based on individual criteria and runs EU-compliant outreach. 
![Europe Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c3587088b66a048902f1f0_europe.png)
Proudly made in the European Union
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c3d04287cdcc14a94299d6_phone.png)](https://www.getventa.ai/<tel:+498921525175>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c3d110cfac32e768c41d00_mail.png)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c3d12eeefe59d75b061fa4_linkedin.png)](https://www.getventa.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/ventaai>)

### Frequently Asked Questions
###### Can I use Venta to reach ou﻿t to companies outside of Europe?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c2357e9084a4644a5fb387_icon-chevron-right.svg)
Yes, you can. Venta's AI workers have access to global databases and can conduct research in multiple languages. They are mainly trained in German and English, making them ideal for outreach in these languages.
###### Is Venta GDPR compliant?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c2357e9084a4644a5fb387_icon-chevron-right.svg)
Venta is operated and hosted within the EU, fully complying with GDPR regulations. It also accesses databases outside the EU, that are GDPR compliant as detailed in our General Terms and Conditions.
###### We have specific security requirements that are not addressed on your site. Would you be able to accommodate them?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c2357d9084a4644a5fb2ac/65c2357e9084a4644a5fb387_icon-chevron-right.svg)
We are always trying to accommodate for special requirements. Please get in touch with us. 
![⟨12⟩](https://www.getventa.ai/<#>)
Venta empowers outbound-driven sales teams in Germany to do highly targeted outreach with best in class comp﻿any and contact data. Our AI worker finds companies based on individual criteria and runs EU-compliant outreach.

generated_description:
### Venta AI: The Future of Lead Qualification

**Overview**  
Founded in 2022 and based in Munich, Germany, Venta AI is shaking up the sales enablement space with its cutting-edge AI technology. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S23, Venta is focused on helping outbound sales teams find and engage potential leads effectively, particularly in Europe.

**Mission**  
Venta AI’s mission is clear: to identify and engage leads with genuine buying intent throughout Europe. They're doing this by meticulously tracking various online signals, including website visitors, search behaviors, and news activities, to generate high-quality leads.

**What They Do**  
Their AI assistant qualifies leads by handling inquiries and creates hyper-personalized outreach messages in five different languages based on leads' behavioral signals. Imagine having an assistant that works tirelessly 24/7—it’s all about maximizing efficiency so sales teams can do what they do best: connect meaningfully with prospects.

**Target Market**  
Primarily focused on sales teams in the DACH region (Germany, Austria, Switzerland), Venta AI equips these teams with tools to increase meeting bookings by up to 30%. The technology allows for multi-channel outreach—be it via LinkedIn, phone, or personalized letters—while ensuring compliance with European regulations.

**Team**  
With a compact team of five, the founder Lucas Spreiter leads the charge, backed by Nicolas Dessaigne as a Group Partner. This nimble structure ensures quick adaptability and a high degree of innovation.

**Technical Edge**  
Venta's AI works by accessing over ten databases and scraping the web to find the most relevant company and contact data, ensuring that users benefit from top-notch data quality. Notably, they’re also GDPR compliant, which is a significant plus for any business operating within the region.

**Customer Experiences**  
Feedback from users highlights the transformational impact of Venta’s automation in lead qualification. From slashing research time from days to just hours to providing an all-in-one tool for outreach, customer testimonials reflect a strong appreciation for how Venta simplifies complex processes.

**Conclusion**  
In the rapidly evolving landscape of sales enablement, Venta AI stands out as a proactive solution for organizations looking to optimize their lead generation and qualification processes. With their intelligent AI technology, they’re empowering sales teams to make data-driven decisions that ultimately lead to increased success in securing business.

For more information, visit [getventa.ai](https://www.getventa.ai).
